languages.text: "Поскольку вы официально присоединились к свите, проктор, я напомню, что теперь слово Лорд-капитана будет для вас законом".

traits.locale_text: "Поскольку вы официально присоединились к свите, проктор, я напомню, что теперь слово Лорд-капитана будет для вас законом".

languages.text: "Since you have now officially joined the Rogue Trader's retinue, Proctor, let me remind you that the Lord Captain's word is law to you from here on out."
languages.original_text: "Поскольку вы официально присоединились к свите, проктор, я напомню, что теперь слово Лорд-капитана будет для вас законом".

traits.locale_text: "Since you have now officially joined the Rogue Trader's retinue, Proctor, let me remind you that the Lord Captain's word is law to you from here on out."
"Since you have now officially joined the Rogue Trader's retinue, Proctor, let me remind you that the Lord Captain's word is law to you from here on out."

"Since you have now officially joined the Rogue Trader's retinue, Proctor, let me remind you that the Lord Captain's word is law to you from here on out."

languages.text: 「代理人殿、あなたはこれで正式にローグトレーダーの従者に加わったのです。ここから先は、ロード・キャプテンの言葉がそのままあなたにとっての法だということを、お忘れなきよう」
languages.original_text: "Since you have now officially joined the Rogue Trader's retinue, Proctor, let me remind you that the Lord Captain's word is law to you from here on out."

traits.locale_text: 「代理人殿、あなたはこれで正式にローグトレーダーの従者に加わったのです。ここから先は、ロード・キャプテンの言葉がそのままあなたにとっての法だということを、お忘れなきよう」

languages.text: "Da Ihr nun offiziell dem Gefolge {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin} angehört, Proktor, darf ich Euch daran erinnern, dass das Wort des Lord Captains von nun an Gesetz für Euch ist."
languages.original_text: "Since you have now officially joined the Rogue Trader's retinue, Proctor, let me remind you that the Lord Captain's word is law to you from here on out."

traits.locale_text: "Da Ihr nun offiziell dem Gefolge {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin} angehört, Proktor, darf ich Euch daran erinnern, dass das Wort des Lord Captains von nun an Gesetz für Euch ist."

languages.text: « Puisque vous faites désormais officiellement partie de l'entourage {mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande}, proctor, permettez-moi de vous rappeler que sa parole fait loi. Cela vaut pour vous aussi, dorénavant. »
languages.original_text: "Since you have now officially joined the Rogue Trader's retinue, Proctor, let me remind you that the Lord Captain's word is law to you from here on out."

traits.locale_text: « Puisque vous faites désormais officiellement partie de l'entourage {mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande}, proctor, permettez-moi de vous rappeler que sa parole fait loi. Cela vaut pour vous aussi, dorénavant. »

languages.text: «Ahora que se ha unido oficialmente al séquito {mf|del|de la} Comerciante Independiente, Procurador, he de recordarle que de ahora en adelante la palabra {mf|del|de la} Lord Capitán es ley para usted».
languages.original_text: "Since you have now officially joined the Rogue Trader's retinue, Proctor, let me remind you that the Lord Captain's word is law to you from here on out."

traits.locale_text: «Ahora que se ha unido oficialmente al séquito {mf|del|de la} Comerciante Independiente, Procurador, he de recordarle que de ahora en adelante la palabra {mf|del|de la} Lord Capitán es ley para usted».

languages.text: “既然你已经正式成为了行商浪人的随行人员，监察官，那我得提醒你。从现在起，对你而言，舰长大人的话就是律法。”
languages.original_text: "Since you have now officially joined the Rogue Trader's retinue, Proctor, let me remind you that the Lord Captain's word is law to you from here on out."

traits.locale_text: “既然你已经正式成为了行商浪人的随行人员，监察官，那我得提醒你。从现在起，对你而言，舰长大人的话就是律法。”

languages.text: "Hür Tacir'in maiyetine resmî olarak katıldığına göre şunu sakın unutma Üsteğmen: Lord Kaptan'ın sözü, buralarda kanundur."
languages.original_text: "Since you have now officially joined the Rogue Trader's retinue, Proctor, let me remind you that the Lord Captain's word is law to you from here on out."

traits.locale_text: "Hür Tacir'in maiyetine resmî olarak katıldığına göre şunu sakın unutma Üsteğmen: Lord Kaptan'ın sözü, buralarda kanundur."
